altername_name: PlayStation Demo Disc, Demo 1, Demo One (Version 5)
name: Demo One: Version 5 [SCED-00816 / PBPX-95001]
overview: A compilation of early PlayStation 1 demo games that used to be bundled with consoles. This is the European version which had four different variants released. The first came in a red sleeve with Formula 1 '97 listed as a playable demo, although it is not on the disc. On the second red sleeve the title has been removed from the list. The third variant came in a purple sleeve. These three were printed and pressed in Japan. There is an unconfirmed variant which came in a purple paper sleeve with a top flap. The fourth, differently titled disc was pressed in Austria like most PAL demos. Contents: - V-CD (Utility for watching VideoCD movies) - Tech demos (Dino / Manta) - Playable Demos: Abe's Oddysee, Hercules, Lifeforce Tenka, Porsche Challenge, Rage Racer, Rapid Racer, Kurushi, Over Board. - Trailers: Soulblade, Rosco McQueen.
